name: One Big Swing
description:
Only one sword swing to  smash enemies with, then the pesky thing gets stuck in the dirt and you have to yank it out. 

With the theme of "Only One," I decided to make a game where you can only swing your giant sword once. I thought that I needed some recurring mechanic so I figured a nice twist would be that it gets stuck in the ground and you have to get near it and loosen it from the dirt while enemies are bearing down on you. It becomes a space and interaction management game with a feel similar to the original Nazi Zombies.

WASD - Movement

Left Click:

  • With Sword - swing sword
  • Near Sword in ground - loosen

Just pretend the enemies hurt you. Didn't get as much implemented as I would have liked.
